alert.note: Alert for Grand Traverse (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:32PM EDT until June 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LEELANAU AND WEST CENTRAL GRAND TRAVERSE COUNTIES... At 531 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fouch, or near Traverse City, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At around 510 pm, quarter size hail resulted in vehicle damage 1 mile north of Chums Corner. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Traverse City, Greilickville and Fouch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
